board

Class NetworkHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.NetworkHandler

  •  class NetworkHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The NetworkHandler class handles finding completed networks, partial networks, and network stats for scoring.
    Author:
    ________

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkHandler()
      Creates a new empty NetworkHandler.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getNetworkSizes(int color)
      Returns a LinkedList of the sizes of all the subnetworks for the specified color.
      (package private) int getNumConnections(int color)
      Returns the number of connections between two pieces of the specified color on the board
      (package private) boolean hasNetwork(int color)
      Returns true if the player of the specified color has a fully formed network (as defined in the README) and false otherwise.
      (package private) void makeMove(player.Move m, int color)
      Updates internal configuration with the specified move for the specified color.
      (package private) void undoMove(player.Move m, int color)
      Updates the internal configuration to remove the specified move for the specified color.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkHandler

        NetworkHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • makeMove

        void makeMove(player.Move m,
            int color)
        Updates internal configuration with the specified move for the specified color. Assumes that m is a valid move. Uses color as specified in Board.WHITE and Board.BLACK (assume the same for other methods).
        Parameters:
        m - Move to update with
        color - color of the player who made the move

      • undoMove

        void undoMove(player.Move m,
            int color)
        Updates the internal configuration to remove the specified move for the specified color. Assumes that m was the last move and made by the specified player.
        Parameters:
        m - Move to remove
        color - color of the player who made the move

      • hasNetwork

        boolean hasNetwork(int color)
        Returns true if the player of the specified color has a fully formed network (as defined in the README) and false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player
        Returns:
        true if a network for the specified player exists, false otherwise

      • getNetworkSizes

        LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> getNetworkSizes(int color)
        Returns a LinkedList of the sizes of all the subnetworks for the specified color.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player
        Returns:
        a list of the sizes of all the subnetworks.

      • getNumConnections

        int getNumConnections(int color)
        Returns the number of connections between two pieces of the specified color on the board
        Parameters:
        color - color of the player
        Returns:
        the number of connections of the color color
